Experience

Settlers Drift is a 5-star luxury tented lodge located in the malaria-free Kariega Game Reserve in the Eastern Cape.
The reserve stretches across 9,000 hectares of pristine bushveld, offering close encounters with the Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino – as well as a variety of other interesting animals.
Situated along the magnificent Garden Route, Kariega is a wonderful safari choice for guests visiting Cape Town or the beautiful coastline.

Stay

Settlers Drift offers 9 spacious tented suites, each with an opulent bedroom, living area, full bathroom, indoor & outdoor shower, mini bar & private deck with beautiful views.
Lodge facilities include a restaurant, bar, wine cellar, spacious deck, swimming pool, boma, curio shop, library & spa area.

Activities

Exciting activities at Settlers Drift include open 4x4 game drives, walks, fishing, spa treatments & boating on the Bushman’s River. Here exquisite scenery & enchanting birdlife can be enjoyed.
Guests to Settlers Drift can choose to arrive & depart by boat too.

The reserve stretches across 9,000 hectares of pristine bushveld, offering close encounters with the Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino – as well as a variety of other interesting animals.
